context: Hello what kind of movies are you looking for?
Hi, I love musicals and am looking for some new ones! Les Misérables (2012) is a current favorite
I am not sure that I know many musicals. I have never seen Les Misérables (2012). I have seen Annie (1982) as a child.
I also enjoy The Phantom of the Opera (2004) I have seen Annie but it was sort of meh
resp: I haven't seen that one either. If anything I am a horror fan all the way. I grew up watching A Nightmare on Elm Street (1984) and Friday the 13th (1980).
